mapper.select: select antique_id antiqueId, seq_no seqNo, antique_name antiqueName, antique_type antiqueType, antique_dynasty antiqueDynasty, antique_area antiqueArea, antique_texture antiqueTexture, antique_usage antiqueUsage, antique_completion antiqueCompletion, antique_length antiqueLength, antique_width antiqueWidth, antique_height antiqueHeight, antique_weight antiqueWeight, antique_count antiqueCount, museum_id museumId, author_id authorId, antique_like_count antiqueLikeCount, antique_favourite_count antiqueFavouriteCount, antique_collection_department antiqueCollectionDepartment, antique_source antiqueSource, antique_collection_date antiqueCollectionDate, antique_registration_num antiqueRegistrationNum, antique_identification_date antiqueIdentificationDate, antique_level antiqueLevel, antique_appraiser antiqueAppraiser, antique_protection_level antiqueProtectionLevel, create_date createDate, creator creator, update_date updateDate, updater updater, del_flag delFlag from t_antique

select antique_id antiqueId, seq_no seqNo, antique_name antiqueName, antique_type antiqueType, antique_dynasty antiqueDynasty, antique_area antiqueArea, antique_texture antiqueTexture, antique_usage antiqueUsage, antique_completion antiqueCompletion, antique_length antiqueLength, antique_width antiqueWidth, antique_height antiqueHeight, antique_weight antiqueWeight, antique_count antiqueCount, museum_id museumId, author_id authorId, antique_like_count antiqueLikeCount, antique_favourite_count antiqueFavouriteCount, antique_collection_department antiqueCollectionDepartment, antique_source antiqueSource, antique_collection_date antiqueCollectionDate, antique_registration_num antiqueRegistrationNum, antique_identification_date antiqueIdentificationDate, antique_level antiqueLevel, antique_appraiser antiqueAppraiser, antique_protection_level antiqueProtectionLevel, create_date createDate, creator creator, update_date updateDate, updater updater, del_flag delFlag from t_antique where antique_id = #{ antiqueId } and seq_no = #{ seqNo }
mapper.insert: insert into t_antique( antique_id, seq_no, antique_name, antique_type, antique_dynasty, antique_area, antique_texture, antique_usage, antique_completion, antique_length, antique_width, antique_height, antique_weight, antique_count, museum_id, author_id, antique_like_count, antique_favourite_count, antique_collection_department, antique_source, antique_collection_date, antique_registration_num, antique_identification_date, antique_level, antique_appraiser, antique_protection_level, create_date, creator, update_date, updater, del_flag ) values ( #{ antiqueId }, #{ seqNo }, #{ antiqueName }, #{ antiqueType }, #{ antiqueDynasty }, #{ antiqueArea }, #{ antiqueTexture }, #{ antiqueUsage }, #{ antiqueCompletion }, #{ antiqueLength }, #{ antiqueWidth }, #{ antiqueHeight }, #{ antiqueWeight }, #{ antiqueCount }, #{ museumId }, #{ authorId }, #{ antiqueLikeCount }, #{ antiqueFavouriteCount }, #{ antiqueCollectionDepartment }, #{ antiqueSource }, #{ antiqueCollectionDate }, #{ antiqueRegistrationNum }, #{ antiqueIdentificationDate }, #{ antiqueLevel }, #{ antiqueAppraiser }, #{ antiqueProtectionLevel }, #{ createDate }, #{ creator }, #{ updateDate }, #{ updater }, #{ delFlag } )
mapper.update: update t_antique set antique_id = #{ antiqueId }, seq_no = #{ seqNo }, antique_name = #{ antiqueName }, antique_type = #{ antiqueType }, antique_dynasty = #{ antiqueDynasty }, antique_area = #{ antiqueArea }, antique_texture = #{ antiqueTexture }, antique_usage = #{ antiqueUsage }, antique_completion = #{ antiqueCompletion }, antique_length = #{ antiqueLength }, antique_width = #{ antiqueWidth }, antique_height = #{ antiqueHeight }, antique_weight = #{ antiqueWeight }, antique_count = #{ antiqueCount }, museum_id = #{ museumId }, author_id = #{ authorId }, antique_like_count = #{ antiqueLikeCount }, antique_favourite_count = #{ antiqueFavouriteCount }, antique_collection_department = #{ antiqueCollectionDepartment }, antique_source = #{ antiqueSource }, antique_collection_date = #{ antiqueCollectionDate }, antique_registration_num = #{ antiqueRegistrationNum }, antique_identification_date = #{ antiqueIdentificationDate }, antique_level = #{ antiqueLevel }, antique_appraiser = #{ antiqueAppraiser }, antique_protection_level = #{ antiqueProtectionLevel }, create_date = #{ createDate }, creator = #{ creator }, update_date = #{ updateDate }, updater = #{ updater }, del_flag = #{ delFlag } where antique_id = #{ antiqueId } and seq_no = #{ seqNo }
mapper.delete: delete from t_antique where antique_id = #{ antiqueId } and seq_no = #{ seqNo }
